name: Hentai Chaos Run
description:
Hentai Chaos Run- a third-person runner in which an anime girl run and fights against an enemies for saving own life.

The adventure of an anime girl trying to reach endless freedom by fighting her enemies in a world full of deadly obstacles and traps.

Deadly Tentacles Will Never Let You Go.

Features

+ Different enemies and traps
+ Endless Run
+ Score Board
